value:
These clothes take me back to my
childhood. Although, I believe Lucina
once got me something similar...

"Naga, god of light, appears as a
young girl, and Salamander, god of
fire, takes the form of an old man..."$k$pHehe, they certainly sound familiar.

People worship dragons as gods, but
we are neither ageless nor immortal.

The blood of dragons, shared with
the people, helped fan the flames of
war... There are worlds like that, too.

Wearing these clothes, I am reminded
of the days I spent with Mar-Mar and
the others so very long ago...

I'm Tiki, a manakete. This is from
your friend $Nf.

I know what I am capable of now,
which is why I will warn you—do not
force me to take this seriously.
Is this all right?

Sorry, I think... *yawn* ...I might be
getting sleepy again.

Thaaa— *yawn* ...Thank you. Would
you mind if I take a little nap?

*yawn* ...Oh, did you call for me?
I am Tiki, inheritor of the blood and
soul of the Divine Dragon, Naga.

Summoner, do you have a moment?
There is something I would like to ask
you. Do you...believe in reincarnation?$k$pAh, the look on your face tells me all
I need to know. I suppose that is
normal in this world.$k$pThere is a reason I ask, of course. We
Heroes may be but echoes from other
worlds and even times.$k$pTo draw upon the power of those
echoes... Well, I suppose the desire to
save others can take many forms.$k$pWhen you live for three thousand
years, it becomes difficult to not
wonder about such things.$k$pThere are no coincidences. Only fate.$k$pIf that fate has an architect, I have yet
to meet them. So, shall we seek it?
Together, to a world yet unknown.
Do not trouble me!
Out of the way!
Step by step!
I'll protect you all!
I'm so sorry...
As I dreamt, I heard so many voices calling my name...
Huh? What? I'm awake! Can't you tell?
My age? Now that's a secret!
Ever since I've come to Askr, I've met rather a lot of people! So many of them are dear to me now.
*long yawn* Oh, sorry, sorry. I am a bit sleepy.
This is one dream that I would like to keep having for as long as I can.
I'm so used to being left behind... Even so, I do want to stay here with you.
Very well.
Hmm...
Leave it to me!
